attributes.action: Support early & late flights to & from Manston Airport in Kent
attributes.additional_details:
Please support Manston Airport flights, before these do-gooder campaigners have it closed!
This airport should be the link to all your holiday destinations in the south-east, without having to go to Gatwick & beyond, to pay crazy prices & queue for hours for departures from the UK.
Manston has been in operation since 1916 in one form or another through World War 1 & 2.
The American Air force, including B-52 bombers have used it until the late '90's.
No problems were ever arisen during this time.

Suddenly people are complaining about a local airport that can save the people of the South-east of England a lot of time, effort & money !

This is an airport with a lot of history that should be a major  British airport in the South-east of England.

Do I live under the potential flight path..?... YES!!

rejection.details: Please be clear what action you are asking the UK Government to take.
